Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Likhuwa lia Nyasaye liloola butswa, kho mulayungubasia tawe. Oluyali nolulwe ne ali hekulu muno mukabamutsokasinjia ninako
Yeshinjia Malaika nende obufimbuli, khubuchami bubwe khu ulia owayenya mubasumba bebe, mbu: “yekanyilisie (Abandu) mbu abulaho ulaamwa owulali esie kho murie esie.”
Yaloonga likulu nende eshialo khubwatoto, ali hekulu muno nende khubiabamutsokasinjia ninabio
Yaloonga Omundu okhurulana nende indonyande yamatsi kolwibulo, mana naye naba omuyingasi owahabulafu
Ne yaloonga tsisolo, mwetso munyoolangamwo obutundumu nende obukhoonyi ne etsindi mutsilitsanga
Ne mulolanga obulayi olwa mutsikalusinjia ingolobe nende shingala mutsiyilanga mushiayo itsuli
Ne tsibachinjilanga emisiko chienyu okhula mutsingongo tsiamulakholelemwo halali nimunyakhane muno. Toto Nyasaye wenyu ni Omuholo muno Owetsimbabaasi
Nende tsifarasi nende tsinyumbu, nende tsisishili, mutsininenjekhwo nende oburone (bwenyu) ne alaloonga ebia mulamanyile tawe
Ni khu Nyasaye okhubechesia injila (ili habwene) netsiliwo etsindi tsilali habwene tawe. Ne yenyanga toto yakhabalunjisiyie mwesi
Ye niye ubeshilinjia amatsi okhurula mwikulu, khuko munyoolanga kokhunywa, nende emimela chiamulisinjia ebiayo
Ne khuko abamesilinjia ebirache nende zaituni nende emitende nende emizabibu nende buli ebiamo, toto mwako khulimwo nende ameeko khubandu baparanga
Ne yabakwalasilia eshilo nende eshitere, eliuba nende omwesi, nende tsin’gining’ini tsiosi tsiakwalasibwa khubunyali bubwe. Toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko khubandu bobwongo
Nende bilia ebiayasalasia khushialo ebiobukoondo bukabukhane. Toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko khubandu bawulilanga amebaalo

Niye wabakwalasilia inyanza mbu khomunyoole okhuliamwo inyama indorotoro inzelemu, nemurusinjiamwo ebirone bia mwifwalanga, ne olola shinga ebininungwamwo shingala bikhalakaninjiamwo, mbu khomunyoole tsimbabaasi tsitsie, nekhomunyoole okhumupila orio
Ne nara khushialo tsingulu mbu (eshialo) shilabeyabeya ninanyu tawe, nende emialo nende tsinjila khomunyoole okhuloondakhwo
Ne yaraho ebimanyisio bindi. Ne khutsing’ining’ini nitsiabalunjisilanjiakhwo injila
Mbu ulia owaloonga yakhaba shiabulala nende ulia ulaalonga tawe? Koo shimwitsulilanga tawe
Ne nimubala tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye (khwinywe) shimwakhatsimala tawe, toto Nyasaye niwobulesheli owetsimbabaasi muno
Ne Nyasaye amanyile kamufisanga nende akamuretsanga habulafu
Nebalia abalaamanga ebilali Nyasaye tawe, shibaloonganga shiosishiosi tawe halali bo balongwa
Ni abafuu shinabalamu tawe, ne bakorerwe mbu balilamusibwa lina
Nyasaye wenyu ni Nyasaye mulala, ne balia abalasuubilanga mwikulu tawe emioyo chiabu chikhayanga nabo belolanga
Toto bwene Nyasaye yamanya akamufisanga nende akamuretsanga habulafu, toto ye shiyachama abelolanga tawe
Ne nibarebwa mbu nishina shia Nyasaye wenyu yeshiye? Nibaboola mbu: “ni tsingano tsiakhalesa tsiobubeyi.”
Kho bachinge emisiko chiabu emilamba inyanga yeyindukho, nende emisiko chiabalia ababakosinjia khukhubula obumanyi. Koo ni amabii kali karie kano kabachinganga
Toto balia abali imbeli wabu bakhola ebifwanga biabu, mana Nyasaye naresia amatililo ketsinzu tsiabu mana ebitsafu nibibakwila, okhurula hekulu mana eshinyasionishibetselamunjilayabalamanyile tawe

Mana inyanga yeyindukho alibafimbia omurwe, ne aliboola mbu: “balihena balia abamwanzokasinjia ninabo, abachilanga nimusoolana?” balia abahebwa obumanyi baliboola mbu: “toto isoni nende amasila nyanga yino biloolela Abakhayi.”

Balia aba Malaika bafwisia nibekholele obwononi, mana baliloonda lilako(baliboola mbu:) “sikhwakholanga obwononi bwosibwosi tawe” (abamalaika balibakalusia mbu:) “ hee toto bwene Nyasaye yamanya muno akamwakholanga.”
“kho injilie mumiliango chiomumulilo kwa jahanam, ne mumenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi. Ne ni eshimenyo eshibi muno khubandu Abafuru.”
